title: Curious Creatures New Spring Apparel
content:
Curious Creatures, makers of technical mountain bike apparel, announced new apparel and colorways for the spring season…

The new Men’s Sun Dog Short joins the Sun Dog Collection this season. Constructed from buttery-soft, four-way stretch 100% polyester fabric, these 12.5” inseam shorts provide exceptional comfort and freedom of movement. Designed for long days in the saddle, the lightweight, highly breathable fabric ensures optimal performance on and off the trail. The Men’s Sun Dog Short is available in sizes 28-40.

For women who love the Sun Dog Short but prefer a longer inseam, the new Bitterroot Bloom Short offers a bike-specific length with a 12.5” inseam for added coverage and knee pad compatibility. It features the same wide, extra-comfy waistband and 100% polyester, four-way stretch fabric with two drop-in hand pockets in the front and back. The Women’s Bitterroot Bloom Short is available in sizes 0-20.

This season also brings fresh colorways for inline favorites, including the Women’s Sun Dog Shorts, Women’s Corner Pocket Tee, made in the USA with recycled cotton, Ramble Scramble Shorts, and more.

Like most Curious Creatures apparel, these items are recyclable at the end of their life. The brand continues to partner with a local Montana repair shop to assist with any necessary repairs for well-loved shorts.

See more from this season’s apparel drop at Curious Creatures.
